data.title: Bollywood Actors – CineTalkers
data.text:
Karanvir Sharma Biography :

Born : Oct 26, 1981

Age : 33

Height : 5.11

Birthplace :N/A

This man is yet another Mr. Perfectionist in making in B Town, who is all set to make his debut in Bollywood. He is among the enthusiastic and zestful man in his circle, which really helped him to find a movie in B Town. This is nothing but the Romantic Comedy called Sadda Adda, which is produced under the banner – Rajtaru Studios Ltd. He hails from Pakistan wherein was born and brought, however, with a break in B Town, he has now shifted to do a couple of modeling assignments and movies as well. He is all set to embark with his B Town career apart from modeling assignments. Apart from getting ads in his home country, he also has done a number of ad campaigns in overseas including Middle East and other nations too.

He started his career as a model wherein he got the chance to do a number of commercials, which is more than 200, if you count them together. In fact, he is among the few top models, who is also seen in a number of international brands including the Gas like Pal, Porsche, Ed, Zileri, Puma, Hardy, etc. Apart from doing a number of modeling assignments, he is also seen learning and mastering the filmmaking skills including scripting, editing, cinematography, directing, etc. According to the actor, in the popular show of Anupam Kher wherein he claimed to do thing with utter professionalism and perfection.

Besides, he is also called a multipurpose man who has even undergone martial art training by competent people like RP Yadav and Allan Amin. Apart from this, he has also learn a number of dance styles including Tap, Jazz, Jive, Oscar, Bosco Ceasar, Mambo, Salsa, Crumping, etc. He is now all set to debut in the movie called Sadda Adda, which written and directed by the man Muazzam Beg and is produced by the Agarwal Brothers (Ramesh, Rajiv and Ramesh). This movie is all about six unmarried guy who live together in a Flat in Delhi’s middle class colony hailing from different states. Their flat is known as Sadda Adda, while the story deals with their dreams and aspirations.

The post Karanvir Sharma appeared first on .

Adil Hussain Biography :

Born: October 5, 1963

Age : Age 51

Birthplace : Goalpara

Height : 5.11

This man is known for incredible acting skills in offbeat movies especially if you remember his role in Life of Pi. He hails from Assam wherein he was born and brought up in a place called Goalpara in a non film background. He was the youngest among his siblings. After his schooling, he headed to Guwahati for doinghis graduation in Philosophy from the known college Borooah College in the state capital of Assam. He then got involved in acting and soon tried his luck in stand up comedy. He was soon popular of making mimicries of different Bollywood actors and thus even formed his own stand up comedy group called Bhaya Mama Group. After working as a stand up comedian for around six years, he finally headed to Delhi to join NSD (national school of drama) in the year 1990 wherein he graduated in 1993. Later he went to Drama Studio London on a scholarship from Charles Wallace India Trust to learn filmmaking and acting.

After returning India, he joined one mobile theatre group called Hengul Theatre in Assam wherein he worked for three years and then left to Delhi. He then got training under Khalid Tyabji and later went Aurobindo Ashram, Puducherry to get another training from Shaupon Boshu. He later got involved in several theatre groups wherein he did some of the popular plays including Othello: A Play in Black and White in 1999 and Goodbye Desdemona, both of these plays were awarded internationally. He remained as a trainer and art director with Society for Artists and Performers in Hampi till 2007 and is a visiting faculty at Royal Conservatory of Performing Arts, Hague apart from being the faculty at NSD, New Delhi. His debut in movies was seen in Bengali movie called Iti Srikanta with Soha Ali Khan, while on TV he was seen in Jasoos Vijay. In Bollywood movies, he had shorter cameos including in Kaminey, Ishqiya and slightly bigger role in Agent Vinod.

Soon he was seen in the movie called English Vinglish wherein his performance was applauded working with Sridevi. Some of his remarkable performance was witnessed in overseas projects including The Reluctant Fundamentalist and Life of PI. Also, his character in Lessons in Forgetting was applauded a lot over New Jersey Independent South Asian Cine Fest. His character of Cop in Lootera was also applauded in 2013, while his upcoming movies include two English movies White Lies and Feast of Varanasi and one Assamese called Rodor Sithi. The actor is based in New Delhi, while he is married with a son.

The post Adil Hussain appeared first on .

Tusshar Kapoor Biography :

Born: November 20, 1976

Age : 37

Birthplace : Mumbai

Height: 1.75 m

Tusshar Kapoor is a known actor of B Town, who has appeared in a number of Bollywood movies. He comes from a influential family of Tinsel Town. His father Jeetendra is a known actor of Bollywood who was very much popular in the era of seventies and eighties. His father has ruled the hearts of many fans both India and abroad, while his sister Ekta Kapoor is a known producer and owner of Balaji Telefilms, which is one of the popular production house of TV serials and Bollywood movies. He was born and brought in Mumbai, after doing his schooling and junior college, he headed to University of Michigan to learn filmmaking and acting. He is still single and thus happens to be the most eligible bachelor in B Town.

Now talking about his career, after returning to India, he headed to Bollywood and did his debut movie called Mujhe Kucch Kehna Hai in the year 2001 along with Kareena Kapoor. The movie was a big hit for which he was even applauded with Filmfare Award under the best debut category. However, his next two movies turned out flop at box office despite he worked along with his father in one of these movies called Kucch To Hai in 2003. The next venture was Gayab in the year 2004 wherein he played the character of an invisible boy, which applauded. Later he was seen in Khakee along with Big B, Ajay Devgn and Akshay Kumar for which he was applauded critically playing a the role of a young police officer called Ashwin Gupte. His second big hit over box office was his own sister’s venture called Kyaa Kool Hai Hum in 2005, which he did along with Riteish Deshmukh.

Later he was in the multi-starrer comedy of Rohit Shetty called Golmaal wherein he played the character of a mute guy, which was applauded by both audience and critics. Some of his other movies include Good Boy Bad Boy, Kya Love Story Hai, Shootout at Lokhandwala, and the two sequels of Golmal. His movies like Aggar, Dhol, Kya Super Cool Hai Hum, and Bajate Raho were below average, which simply failed to bring any difference over the box office. His upcoming movie is Mastizaade, which he will be doing along with Sunny Leone. Apart from acting, he is also venturing as a co-producer for the movie called Char Din Ki Chandni wherein he is also seen as an actor in the film. Besides he also keeps on participating in different social causes including the Fashion For a Cause event in 2012 for raising money for orphan kids.

The post Tusshar Kapoor appeared first on .

Malaika Arora Khan Biography :

Born: October 23, 1973

Age : 41

Birthplace : Chembur, Mumbai

Height: 1.68 m

Malaika is a popular item dancer, actress, VJ, model and TV show presenter. She is known to her passion for dance and music and thus considered to be the top item girls and thus a number of popular item numbers like Munni Badnam Hui and songs like Chaiyaa Chaiyaa for the movie Dil Se. He is born and brought in Mumbai in a Punjabi family. Her father was Punjabi, while her mom was a catholic and comes from a non filmy background. She is married to Arbaz Khan the younger brother of Salman Khan but still practises Catholic. The couple has a son. She did her schooling from Holy Cross High School, Thane, while after doing her 10+2, she started her modelling career.

While doing her modelling, she got the chance to work with MTV and soon she turned to be the VJ for the popular channel. She interviewed a number of B Town celebrities and later started anchoring with popular VJ called Cyrus Broacha under the popular programs like Style Check and Love Line. She entered into the modelling world and soon was seen in doing a number of commercial over smaller screens. While doing ads, she also got the chance to do a number of music albums including Gur Naal Ishq Mitha and a couple of items songs in movies like Dil Se for the song Chaiyya Chaiyya. Later in 2010, her song Munni Badnam Hui was a big hit for the movie Dabangg, which was produced by her own husband.

Later she was seen making a world record for performing the same song with 1235 participants. She also won the Taiwan Excellence celebrity endorser for the year 2012. She was even seen endorsing for the 30 plus. She was seen later performing with the stars like Shaan, Atif Aslam, Bipasha Basu, etc, in a number of concerts at O2 Arena London and LG Arena Brimigham. In the year 2014, she did a cameo in the movie of Farah Khan called Happy New Year, which was released last Diwali. Apart from the big banner, she also appears in reality shows as a judge. This include Nach Baliye, which was aired in 2005 at Star One. She continued with the show in Nach Baliye 2, which was aired in the year 2006. In the very same show, she was seen performing a number of item numbers. The other shows include Zara Nachke Dikha and Jhalak Dikhhla Ja wherein she remained in the judge’s panel. Later she was even seen in the popular show called India’s Got Talent.

The post Malaika Arora Khan appeared first on .

Kamal R Khan Biography :

Born: January 1, 1975

Age : 39

Height : 5.4

Birthplace : Deoband

Kamal is rather known as a controversy king on social media apart from being an actor of Bollywood, producer and writer. He hails from Deoband, Dist- Saharanpur (U.P), however, was raised up in New Delhi. He did his schooling from Deoband, while completed his college from New Delhi. Since his childhood he was keen in acting thus kept on trying his luck in theatre and later got the chance to do Bhojpuri film, which helped him to establish as a regional movies actor of Bihar. For being controversial, he was given the chance to participate in a popular TV show called Bigg Boss. Though he was nominated for the eviction in the third week but finally was kicked out from the show owing to his ruthless and violent behaviour for the house mates.

He was even reported abusing Rohit Verma and was seen throwing a water bottle on him, which eventually hit Shamita Shetty. Also, he had fight with the comedian Raju Srivastav. He then headed to Mumbai and produced the film called Deshdrohi under his own production banner, however, it was banned by the state government on the concerns of riots. He was seen making derogatory remarks movie, which brought him in a big controversy. As a film producer, his first movie was a Bhojpuri film called Munna Pandey Berozgaar.

As said above, he has been referred as a king of controversies. Time and again he is involved in making absurd and rude kind of remarks over a number of Bollywood stars and others. Recently, he was making headlines of having a spat with Sonakshi Sinha for his statement of Parineedhi Chopra and Deepika Padukone. He was even reported making tweets about Shah Rukh Khan this year after the general elections when Modi won the elections and sworn in as the Indian Prime Minister. He said that he is leaving the country and Twitter though SRK will not do so, giving a wrong impression about Shah Rukh Khan and confusion in the society. Later SRK has to come out and clarify that he is away from this rot man and has nothing to do with Modi or his win.

Similarly, he was seen speaking rude about Mahesh Bhatt’s movie wherein he called his movie a big flop. He also gave weird and rude reviews to Dhanush the south Indian actor for his movie Raanjhana over YouTube. Later a group of actors from Bollywood approached the court demanding a ban on this man. He is constantly seen making headlines on many actresses and actors including the former porn star- Sunny Leone called her obscene and vulgar. She then lodged an FIR complaining that the Deshdrohi actor has mentally and emotionally harassed the model and actress of B Town.

The post Kamal Rashid Khan (KRK) appeared first on .

Hemant Pandey Biography :

He is more known for his comic role at Doordarshan called Office Office. He is a known TV actor who is equally well known over the silver screen for playing smaller and comic roles in Bollywood movies. He originally hails from Uttarakhand from a place called Pithoragarh. He did his schooling and college from his birthplace only, however, after his studied he headed to New Delhi wherein he joined one NGO called Janmadhyam and Allaripu wherein he started his career of acting with street plays, later he switched over to theatres to do a couple of shows. Finally he shifted to Mumbai to start his formal career in acting. According to him all his childhood has gone in watching the comedy of Johny Lever and other comedians on big screen, which inspired him to tread this path.

After shifting to Mumbai, he continued with theatre and with little time duration, he got a role in a TV show called Hera Pheri. This followed a couple of others including Office Office in 2000, Tammana House and Neer Bhare Tere Naina Devi. His comic role in Office Office was a big hit, which even helped him to find a break in Bollywood movies starting with the movie Mujhe Kuch Kehna Hai starring Tusshar Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor. Since then it was no seeing back as he got a number of movies including Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein, Aap Mujhe Achche Lagne Lage, Badhaai Ho Badhaai, Fareb, Krrish, Detective Naani, Sankat City, Kaalo, Ready and 2 Nights in Soul Valley.

Currently, he is engaged in a TV program called Neer Bhare Tere Naina Devi, which is aired over Ghasita. This is a role of a common villager who is being burdened by his poverty and happens to be the only bread earner of the family. His performance for the said character has been appreciated by audience and critics. Apart from working in this TV series, he is also seen in Kahani Comedy Circus Ki, which is aired in Sony TV. Here he is participating as a stand up comedian. He has been awarded with a couple of TV channels.

The post Hemant Pandey appeared first on .

Rajesh Sharma Biography

Born: October 8, 1980

Age : 34

Birthplace :Ludhiana

This is a very prominent face of Hindi Cinema, mostly seen for smaller and comic roles. You can therefore find in most of the movies with such roles including the ones Luv Shuv Tey Ccicken Khurana’, Chillar Party or Khosla Ka Ghosla. He is born and brought in Ludhiana in Punjab and later headed to Delhi to enrol for the graduation in film and drama at the prestigious institute called NSD or National School of Drama. After completing his training program in acting and filmmaking, he headed to Mumbai, the city of dreams, since all his childhood he wanted to be an actor and thus made his ways to this place.

It was 1995 when he headed to Mumbai and with a bit of struggle, he managed to start his film career with the popular movie Machis. However, before he got his first break he worked with regional movies with similar roles especially in Bengali films. He continued working with the Bengali films till he got a good break in Bollywood. His first Bengali movie was Parmotar Ek Din, which was directed by Aparna Sen starring the director herself along with Soumitra Chatterjee along with Ritupama Sengupta. Following this movie, he did others till he started getting some good roles in Hindi Cinema.

He did a number of movies, some of his earlier movies were mostly Bengali ones like Sonar Sansar, Sathi, Desh, Shubho Mahurat, etc. However, since 2005 he started getting Hindi movies, which include Parineeta, Shikhar, Kranti, Ishqiya, etc. Some of his recent movies include Ghanchakka, BA Pass, Shuddh Desi Romance, Pizza, Strings of Passion (both in Hindi and Bengali) and Taan. Through out his career, he got the chance to work with big actors and bigger banners along with award winning movies, however, he was unfortunate enough to bag any award for his performance.

The post Rajesh Sharma appeared first on .

Kunal Roy Kapur Biography :

Born: January 13, 1979

Age : 35

Height : 6.2

Birthplace : Mumbai

He is one of the brothers of Siddharth Roy Kapur, the known producer and husband of Vidya Balan. Kunaal Roy Kapur is a known film director and actor of Bollywood movies. He hails from New Delhi. Kunal Roy Kapur started acting when he was barely 12 years of age in theatres and then headed Mumbai to pursue his dreams in making something big in Bollywood. After being attached to a number of theatre groups and doing certain plays he then to switched to the venture of photography under the then photograph Boman Irani who later turned an ace actor of B Town. Both his brothers are well settled in Bollywood, with Siddharth Roy Kapur being the CEO of UTV Motion Pictures, while the younger one Aditya R Kapur is an actor who acted in movies like Action Replayy, Aashiqui 2 and Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani and the recently released movie Dawaat-e-Ishq. He is married to the lady called Shayonti, while the couple has two kids – son Zahaan and daughter Shahaz.

He started his career his career by working in a Sony TV popular show of 2000 called Just Mohabbat, while later had a cameo role in the movie called Lions of Punjab in the year 2007. In the meantime, he continued working with theatres and directed a number of plays including the comedy one called The President is Coming in 2006. The play was later converted into the movie called mockumentary The President Is Coming in the year 2009, starring Shernaz Patel and Konkona Sen, which got mix reviews thus turning a semi hit. He then the TV show called Panga Naa Lo. He then was seen in the British adapted Indian comedy series called Mumbai Calling the same year in 2009 playign the character of a call centre executive.

His debut in Abhinav Deo’s movie called Dellhi Belly along with Imran Khan and Vir Das, which was produced by Aamir Khan in the year 2011. This followed another movie called Nautanki Saala in the year 2013 along with Ayushman Khurana, while later the same year he had a small role in the movie Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani playing the character of Kalki’s fiancée along with his younger brother Aditya Roy Kapur, Ranbir Singh and Deepika Padukone. His upcoming movie is Action Jackson directed by Prabhudeva wherein he would be seen along with actors like Ajay Devgan, Sonakshi, Yami Gautam, etc. This will be among the bigger roles in any Bollywood film for him apart from the other ones.

The post Kunal Roy Kapur appeared first on .

Salman Yusuf Khan Biography :

Born: June 12, 1985

Age : 29

Height : 5.8

Birthplace : Bangalore

This man is a popular face on small screen. He is a popular dancer who came into limelight by winning the reality show called Dance India Dance of season 1. After winning this show, he headed to become a choreographer in B Town. Before heading to Bollywood, he tried his choreography skills in a number of dance reality shows. He was born on 12th June 1985 in the city of lakes called Bangalore. He did his schooling from Jeddah in KSA from the reputed International Indian School. Later, he returned to Bangalore to do his mechanical engineering from Nitte Meenakshi Institute of Technology.

Salman Yusuf Khan wiki :

Since his childhood he always aspired to be a dancer, hence he took training from a different dance forms including Salsa, Hiphop, etc. In his college days, he participated in a number of dance competitions and even has won the same. In order to pursue his dreams, he headed to Mumbai wherein he participated the popular dance reality show called Dance India Dance. He is known to have great passion for dancing, while the news of his choreography skills too are now reaching far and wide. After winning the dance competition, he got the chance to work as choreographer for dance shows like Jhalak Dikhla Ja and stood first in the sixth season of the show along with Drashti Dhami.

He made his debut in Bollywood with the film called Wanted wherein he got the chance to choreograph Salman Khan in 2009. He later got the chance to work as a choreographer in the movie Any Body Can Dance, which was directed by the known choreographer Remo D Souza. Currently he is seen in the Fear Factor as a contestant, while in the same year (2014), he managed to get the title of Challenge Setter.

As far as his personal life is concerned, he is married to his old time girl friend called Faiza Haramain who works as an airhostess in a leading airlines company. The duo were seen in the relationship since past one decade. They married as per the Muslim traditions in Bangalore, however, the rumour mill constantly embarked with news having links with his dance partner called Dhrasthi Dhami and even Isha Sharwani, however, he rejected all his gossips and remained committed to Faiza. So bad news therefore her female fans as Salman Y Khan is no more the eligible bachelor of the B Town.

The post Salman Yusuf Khan appeared first on .

Karan Singh Grover Biography :

Born: February 23, 1982

Age : 32

Birthplace : New Delhi

Height: 5.10

Karan Singh Grover is a popular name in the world of smaller screen. He is a known heartthrob of TV apart from being a successful model. He was born and brought up in New Delhi in a Sikh Family, however, was brought up in Middle East in Al Khobar in KSA as his father shifted there for his employment. He therefore had his schooling from the prestigious International Indian School Dammam. After completing his schooling, he returned to Bombay to pursue his further studies. Thus he purused for his degree in Hotel Management from the known hotel management institute called IHM Mumbai, Dadar Catering College. After completing his education, he returned to Middle East wherein he worked as a Marketing Executive in the leading hotel in Oman called Sheraton Hotel group.

His career in acting started with his participation in a contest called Gladrags Manhunt Contest, which won the title and turned a model, which was in the year 2004. Since then he was involved in a number of modelling assignments and finally landed in small screen in the year 2007 starting with Ekta Kapoor’s TV show called Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi on MTV, followed by other show called Dil Mill Gayye, which was a popular Medical Drama. Soon, he became a popular face on the TV and also participated in a number of TV shows including Zara Nachke Dikha, while remained as the finalist over the reality show called Jhalak Dikhla Jaa in its 3rd season. He later participated in another TV show called Fear Factor. He then was seen hosting the popular TV show called known as Perfect Couple at Channel V India.

In the year 2013, he was seen returning to his old daily soaps, including Qubool Hai, which was aired at Zee TV, which even gave him a couple of awards for playing the character of Asad Ahmed Khan. However, he was fired from the show owing to her unprofessional behaviour of coming late at the sets and giving loses to the channel and the producers to which he denied claiming that it was an attempt to defame him. Though he was asked to bring back over the show by the fans, which didn’t happen that slashed down the size of the audience but nothing really happened to bring him back over the show.

In the year 2014 in March, he turned out to be the producer of 4 Lions Films, which is busy making the movie Alone with Bipasha Basu. The movie is directed by Bhushan Patel, while it is scheduled to be released in January 2015. As far as his personal life is concerned, he was married to Shraddha Nigam in the year 2008, however, it ended up with a divorce in just ten months, the bride alleged him to have extramarital affairs with different girls. Later Grover dated Jennifer Winget, who happened to be his co-star in Dill Mill Gaye and Kasauti Zindagi Kay in 2012, but if you believe in the recent rumours, he has again separated from his wife and the couple is pursuing for a divorce.

The post Karan Singh Grover appeared first on .

Barun Sobti Biography :

Born: August 21, 1984

Age : 30

Birthplace : New Delhi

Height: 1.80 m

Barun Sobti happens to be a popular TV actor who has just entered into Bollywood with a movie called Main Aur Mr. Riight with Shenaz Treasurywala. He hails from Keerti Nagar of New Delhi wherein he was born and brought up. He went to Meera Bagh for his schooling and later went to do his college. After his college, he worked with Jindal Telecom for around seven years. Sobti then moved to Bombay in order to pursue his dreams to become an actor after his friend Karan Wahi had forwarded his photographs to a couple of production companies. He was soon offered some low budget projects, which he denied till he got the best. He is married to Pashmeen Manchanda way back in 2010.

He made his debut in the world of acting with a daily faith based show called Shraddha wherein he was seen in the male lead called Swayam Khurana, who happens to be a manipulating photographer having selfish ends. Later, he was seen in a cameo in a medical romance movie called Dill Mill Gayee wherein he had the negative role to play of a patient called Raj Singh, who happens to be a rehabilitation for drug abuse. He then left the serial to join another called Baat Hamari Pakki Hai wherein he played the character of a comic character called Shravan Jaiswal, who happens to be a rich and spoilt fellow, however, is also a nice and good natured fellow.

Barun Sobti then headed to another TV serial called ss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon, which soon turned out to be a popular show over Star Plus. He played the character of Arnav Singh Raizada, who happens to be an egoist and proud businessman. The show had to close down owing to his exit in November 2012. He also hosted a couple of TV shows like Star Parivaar Awards Function in 2012 and caught the Star Parivaar Live Concert 2012 in Birmingham, the United Kingdom. In 2013, he was ranked in the third position under the Sexiest Asian Man by a UK based magazine called Eastern Eye.

Meanwhile doing a number of TV shows and serials, he was offered a movie called Main Aur Mr. Riight in opposite Shenaz, wherein he played the character of a struggling actor who is picked by the character of Shenaz to groom him in order to make him Mr. Right. The movie got an average rating, however, his performance in the movie was appreciated by one and all. His upcoming movies include 22 Yards, which is basically a sports generic movie whom he would be playing in opposite to Suzanna Mukherji, while his other project is Satra Ko Shaadi Hai, which is produced by Bollywood hunk called John Abraham.

The post Barun Sobti appeared first on .

Sahil Shroff Biography :

Born : India

Occupation : Actor, Model

Height : 6 ft

Do you remember the cop Arjun from Don 2, the colleague of Priyanka Chopra, yes, he is the same man, Sahil Shroff is a popular actor and model, who came into fame with Farhan Akhar’s sequel of Don. He hails from a Sindhi family, while was born and brought up in Australia. There he did his schooling and college followed by masters in Information Technology and later went for his Management studies from Australia. He worked for a couple of odd jobs to complete his education including doing graveyard shift in a couple of nightclubs. Later he moved to Bombay, the city of dreams to become a full time model. With his smart physique and capability of carry out different attires on his body made himself noticed in the modelling circles.

After entering the modelling world, Sahil Shroff was seen in the first season of a popular reality TV contest called The Amazing Race Asia in the year 2007. He then did a couple of TV commercials including for the brands like HCL Enterprise, Tata Indica, Lux and Cadbury’s Eclairs. Soon, he was seen over a number of ramps, wherein he walked for popular designers like Manish Malhotra, Narendra Kumar, JJ Valaya and Vikram Phadnis. During his modelling, he got his acting and voice lessons from veteran actors in B Town like Anupam Kher and then entered into the films.

It was in 2011, he made his first appearance in movies, which was none other than the film Don 2 by Farhan Akhtar along with Priyanka Chopra, Lara Dutta and Shah Rukh Khan. The movie was a big hit, which also gave him recognition in the film world giving a couple other movies. His next movie was Shaadi Ke Side Effects with Farhan Akhtar and Vidya Balan, while currently; he is filming for a movie called Desi Magic, starring Amisha Patel and Zayed Khan.

The post Sahil Shroff appeared first on .

Zayed Khan Biography :

Born: July 5, 1980

Age : 34

Birthplace : Mumbai

Spouse: Malaika Parekh (m. 2005)

Zayed Khan’s early claim to fame in Bollywood was his influential family. His father Sanjay Khan is a well known actor and producer. His sister, Suzzane Khan is the ex wife of Bollywood superstar Hrithik Roshan. Besides this, he is the cousin of Fardeen Khan, who at one time was a leading actor.

Zayed debuted with his schoolmate and friend Esha Deol in the film Chura Liya Hain Tumne. Though he made a good impression with his debut performance, success eluded him.Till the time he played the role of Lakshman AKA Lucky in the Shahrukh Khan starrer Main Hoon Na, he was not recognized for his acting . He essayed the role of a happy go lucky student who is the brother of Shahrukh’s character. Main Hoon Na was a Superhit Blockbuster and one of the highest earning films of the year. It also earned him a Filmfare nomination for Best supporting actor in the year 2004.

Besides Main Hoon Na, Zayed’s notable performances include Yuvraj , directed by none other than Subhash Ghai. In Ghai’s saga about three brothers and their estranged relationship , he essayed the role of the youngest brother. The roles of the elder brothers were played by Salman Khan and Anil Kapoor. His performance in the commercially unsuccessful film, was noted to be average.

Zayed was also a part of the multi starrer, Blue , which was a peculiar under water thriller. In the film, he acted alongside Sanjay Dutt, Akshay Kumar and Lara Dutta.

Although many of his movies are multi starrers , he played potential characters in films like Dus, Shabd, Shaadi no. One and Vaada. Mission Istabul, Fight Club and Cash are other film that did justice to his acting skills. He made a special appearance among many actors and actresses in the Shahrukh Khan and Farhan Khan production, OM Shanti Om.

Zayed tied the knot with this childhood friend, Malaika Parekh rubbishing rumors about his link up with actresses Esha Deol and Diya Mirza with whom he has acted in many films. The actor has a son and a daughter.

Presently, Zayed is turning to film production. Besides he is working on Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene and Desi Magic to be released in 2015.

The post Zayed Khan appeared first on .

Amit Sadh Biography :

Born: June 5, 1979

Age : 35

Birthplace : India

Height: 1.75 m

This man is more popular over the smaller screens having being seen in a couple of Bollywood movies as well. He was born and brought up in Mumbai and was known to have the passion for acting since his childhood, which even compelled him to leave his education after his 10+2. Later he headed to New York to get enrolled into the popular The Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute, wherein he learn acting and soon returned to India to start working with smaller screens. His first venture was a Neena Gupta’s TV serial called Kyun Hota Hai Pyarr, wherein he played the character of Aditya giving him positive response for his performance.

He then appeared in a number of TV serials and shows, which include Kohinoor, the much hyped and popular program called Bigg Boss. Later he got the chance to another TV show called Guns and Roses wherein he had played the character of a don. As per him, it was one of his best roles in his career, which he did with Neeru Bajwa. Working with the lady trigged a relationship in the two, which eventually turned into an formal engagement. However, after remaining into a relationship with this actress, he finally broke up in the year 2010 just to focus in his career. He also in a couple of reality shows including ‘Fear Factor’ and dance reality show called ‘Nach Baliye’. He also worked with one of the serials of Shobna Desai on Sony TV called Durgesh Nanidini until he got his break in a film called Kai Po Che, which was released in February 2013.

He got his debut in Bollywood films with Ram Gopal Varma’s movie called Phoonk, wherein he played the character of Ronnie. This followed another movie called Maximum in a very small role playing with Sonu Sood, Neha Dhupia, Naseeruddin Shah, etc. However, he was recognised over the silver screen with the movie Kai Po Che with a breakout role playing along with Shushant Singh Rajput, Rajkummar in 2013. He is currently doing three movies, which include Runningshaadi.com, which is into post production phase, while the other two Guddu Rangeela and 10 Janpath are into pre production phase. As per the latest buzz, he is dating Neeharika the ex wife of Ayub Khan, however, has not declared publically about the same.

Dino Morea Biography :

Born: December 9, 1975

Age : 39

Birthplace : Bengaluru

Height: 1.82 m

This name is moderately popular in Bollywood, which was earlier better in terms of name and fame, but you can count the name of Dino Moreo to be among the faded actors. He hails from Bangalore, wherein he was born and brought up in Indian mother and Italian father. He did his schooling from he prestigious school called Bangalore Military School, while later went to Clarence High School. His graduation was completed from the popular college called St. Joseph’s College in Bangalore. However, while doing his college, he was also involved in modelling and this was the time when while doing one of the assignments in fashion company was spotted by a director who offered him a movie in Bollywood.

Before entering into films, he was a supermodel who has walked over a number of ramps and was even involved in so many ad campaigns. His first movie was Pyaar Mein Kabhi Kabhi, which he did opposite to Rinke Khanna. The movie was declared as flop, but still gave him recognition in B Town giving him a couple of good roles in South Indian films. His first south Indian movie was a Tamil film called film Kandukondain Kandukondain by Rajiv Menon. His very next movie in Bollywood called Raz along with Bipasha Basu was a big hit, which helped him to carve his niche in this domain. It was no looking back for him since Raz, which gave him a couple of films including Baaz: A Bird in Danger, Sssshhh…, Plan, Rakht andAcid Factory, Fight Club, Holiday, etc. Some of his recent movies include Pyaar Impossible, which he did in 2010, and then after four years he got another called Happy New Year wherein he was seen in a very small role.

His upcoming movie is Karan Johar’s sequel of Dostana called Dostana 2. As far as awards are concerned, he was nominated just once in the year 2003 for the Zee Cine Award function and was able to get the award under the category of Dynamic Duo with Bipasha Basu for the movie called Raaz. Now, talking about his personal life, he is still the most eligible bachelor in B Town looking to mingle with the right lady. Earlier, he was reported to date with some of the hot actresses of Bollywood, which include the dusky beauty Bipasha Basu whom he has worked in Raaz, while the other was the former beauty queen Lara Dutta.

Ronit Roy Biography :

Born: October 11, 1965

Age : 49

Birthplace : Nagpur

Height: 1.73 m

This man is more popular over smaller screen than the silver screen. He is a known TV actor who has even seen in a number of movies as well in Bollywood. He was born in Nagpur in 1965 in a business background family. In his childhood only, he headed to Ahmedabad in Gujarat, wherein he did his schooling, followed by a course in Hotel Management course. After completing his studies, he headed to Mumbai to start his career in acting and glamor world. He got the chance to stay at Subhash Ghai’s residence. However, Ghai discouraged him to pursue the career of acting as he cited out a couple of hurdles in it, which becomes difficult for any person without a film background. Hence he then worked in a hotel called Sea Rock Hotel as a management trainee. In order to get a good experience, he worked at different levels, right from a dishwasher to bar tending and managing a number of things. He is married since last ten years to Neelam Singh and has kids of two daughters and one son.

While working in Hotel, he developed an interest in working as an actor, hence with a bit of struggle; he got the chance to act in big screen in a movie called Dushmanon Ka Dushman in the year 1984, however, post this movie, he could only bag another role in 1992 with the movie called Sainik, 15 August and Jaane Tere Naam. Since then it was no looking back for him. Some of his movies include Kisna, Luck By Chance, Hulchal, Army, Udaan, etc. while some of his earlier movies include Students of the Year, Shootout At Wadala, Boss, 2 States, etc, and his upcoming movies include Ugly and Guddu Rangeela. In 1997, he headed toward small screen doing Bombay Blues, Baat Ban Jaye, etc, however, came into limelight with Ekta Kapoor’s TV serials. These include Kammal, Kasautii Zindagi Kay, Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, etc. while some of the recent ones include Bade Achhe Lagte Hain, Itna Karo Na Mujhe Pyaar, Adaalat, etc.

Apart from films and TV shows/serials, he has his own business venture, which comes in the form of a security agency called Ace Security and Protection agency. He is currently providing security to a number of stars include Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Amitabh Bachchan, and Mithun Chakrraborty. Besides, he has also given security services to a couple of movies as well Armaan, Saathiya, Na Tum Jaano Na Hum, Yaadein, Dil Chahta Hai and Lagaan. As far as awards are concerned, he has bagged a number of awards, which include all the prestigious awards for smaller screen along with supporting and negative character for a number of movies as well.

Kay Kay Menon Biography :

Born: October 2, 1966

Age : 48

Birthplace : Kerala

Height: 1.80 m

Kay Kay Menon is a popular B Town actor, who is known to work in a number of Hindi movies. He was born on 2nd October 1966 in a small village in Kerala and soon his parents moved to Mumbai, the city of dreams when he was very young. He did his schooling the popular school St. Josephs Boys’ High School based in Khadki, Pune, while for his college he returned to Mumbai to complete his Bachelor’s Degree in Physics from Mumbai University. This followed his master’s program in business management (MBA) from University of Pune. During his college days he was very much popular for singing Ghazals, which attracted a number of people towards him.

After his education, he simply focused in working in an ad world, while some of his initial ad films included the Kinetic Honda and Cigarette of Marlboro ads in India, which soon followed his move towards theatres wherein he produced a couple of plays. Gradually, he headed to the TV world and finally into in Bollywood making his debut with the movie called Naseem way back in 1995. For giving a start to his career he worked TV shows such as Pradhan Mantri and TV movies like Zebra 2 and Last Train To Mahakali which was aired on the channel star plus. However, he was noticed and appreciated by all in his character oriented role in a popular movie called Hazaaron Khwaahishe Aisi by Sudhir Mishra.

Soon after this he started his career in movies. His performance as the anguished DCP Rakesh Maria in the movie Black Friday has been widely appreciated and acclaimed. He also did a very successful role in the movie Life In A Metro. He portrayed a ruthless Pakistani jailor in Deewar, he played the charming friend in Main, Meri Patni Aur Woh. Films like Corporate, Honeymoon Travels Pvt. Ltd. even strengthened his image as a reliable actor. Let’s not forget his performance as Brigadier RP Singh in Shaurya. Kay Kay Menon has acted with a number of known directors of film industry. His versatility is considered to be his biggest asset, which he just loves to showcase it without any fear or hassle. In the year 2007 he was nominated for the best role of a villain for the movie Sarkar for playing the son of Big B’s character. Some of his recent movies include Haider and Raja Natwarlal, while his upcoming movies include Baby and Bombay Velvet. He is married to Nivedita Bhattacharya whom he had met in his struggling days.

Varun Sharma Biography :

Born : 4th Feb

Birthplace : Jalandhar

Height : 5.10

Though Varun Sharma may be a new face in Bollywood but he is certainly not an unknown name here. He is a popular actor, who came into fame with Farhan Akhtar and Ritesh Sidhwani movie called Fukrey in 2013. He was named in this film as Choocha giving much of fame in B Town. He is born and brought in Jalandhar, Punjab. His schooling came from Lawrence School in Sanawar, while his junior college was completed from APJ School. Later, he headed to Chandigarh wherein he did his Bachelor’s program in Media, Film and Entertainment technology. During his college days, he got attached to theatre wherein he did a number of plays at state and national levels.

He used the platform of theaters in order to polish his acting skills and thus finally headed to Mumbai, wherein he continued working in plays till he was offered a film. After a brief audition, he was offered the role of Choocha in Fukrey, which was directed by Mrighdeep Singh Lamba. The movie initially had a dull start, however, with the passage of time; it turned out to be a big hit giving him positive reviews about his performance both by audience and critics. This gave him a couple of other movies including Rabba Main Kya Karoon Gagan, Warning and Yaaran Da Katchup. His upcoming movies include Dolly Ki Doli, which is in the post production stage with Sonam Kapoor, while the other Kis Kiko Pyar Karu in the filming stage.

As far as awards are concerned, he was nominated at various award functions for his character of Choocha for his first movie Fukrey, which eventually gave him two awards including Star Guild Award under Best Performance in a Comic Role and the Zee Cine Awards for the category of Best Actor in a Comic Role in 2013. Apart from acting in couple of movies, he was also seen in different commercial ads over TV, which include the brands Airtel, Margo Soap, Ebay, Virgin Mobile, etc. As far as his personal life is concerned, he is single and has no girlfriend. He is hesitant in mixing and befriending girls, which has made him lag behind in this domain.

Aftab Shivdasani Biography :

Born: 1987, Mumbai

Height: 5.11

Birthplace : Mumbai, India

Aftab Shivadasni is the same old Farex child, who appeared over the packages of Farex. He is a known actor, model and producer of different movies in Bollywood. He was born and brought in Mumbai in Hindu Sindhi family. Her mother, however, is Parsi and father is Sindhi. He did his schooling from St. Xavier’s High School, while did his B Com from HR College in Mumbai. He married to his old time girl friend Nin Dusanj who hails from a Punjabi family in London, while she works in Hong Kong. He kept his marriage secret, considering his superstition. His wedding was attended by his close friends and family members.

Wiki : Aftab started his career as a child artist appearing as a Farex baby when he was barely 14 months while he appeared in a number of TV commercials. He was seen making his debut in movies like Mr. India in 1987 followed by Awwal Number, ChaalBaaz, Insaniyat and Shahenshah. After this, he kept on appearing over a number of commercial on TV till the age of 19 and finally he got the role at this age in one of the movies of Ram Gopal Varma called Mast opposite Urmila Matondkar. This gave him a high place in Bollywood making him a star leading to a couple of awards including the ones from Star Screen Award under the category of Most Promising Newcomer- Male for the movie Mast. He got this movie, while he was the student of HR College.

After getting a good review for his performance in Mast, he got his next movie called Kasoor in opposite Lisa Ray. He then earned a slew of other movies, which include Love Ke Liye Kuchh Bhi Karega Pyaar Ishq Aur Mohabbat, Koi Mere Dil Se Poochhe, Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai Rahul, Awara Paagal Deewana, Jaani Dushman, Pyaasa, Darna Mana Hai, Hungama, etc. Some of his earlier movies include Daddy Cool, Kambakkht Ishq, Acid Factory, Aao Wish Karein, Bin Bulaye Baraati, 1920 – Evil Returns, Grand Masti, etc. Apart from acting, he has also produced a couple of movies, debuting Aao Wish Karein under his own production company called Rising Sun Entertainment.

The story of the movie was co-written by Aftab, while the other movie he produced includes Bin Bulaye Barati in opposite to Priyanka Kothari. In his career, he has received a couple of awards, including Zee Cine Award for Male Debut for his debut movie Mast, while received the same award the Negative Role for the movie Kasoor. Apart from Zee Cine Award, he has received Star Screen Award for Mast.

Manoj Bajpai Biography :

Born: April 23, 1969

Age : 45

Birthplace : Narkatiaganj

Height: 1.75 m

Manoj Bajpai is not an unknown name in Bollywood and not just in Mumbai but also in the south fondly called as Tollywood. Manoj Bajpayee is a talented actor who is known to do a number of movie in Bollywood and equal number of movies in South Indian film industry. He hails from a small village of Bihar called Belwa, which is at the border of Bhadrak, which falls under Bettiah district in West Champaran. He did his schooling from Khrist Raja High School based in Bettiah. Later, he headed to Delhi wherein he did his graduation in History from the popular Ramjas College in New Delhi. He then tried taking admission in National School of Drama (NSD), however, rejected for four times. Finally he joined the theatre group of Barry John called Barry’s Drama School.

He started his career by teaching Salaam Balak Trust based in New Delhi. Later, he got the chance to do a serial in Doordarshan called Swaabhimaan directed by Mahesh Bhatt along with Ashutosh Rana and Rohit Roy. This opened the gate of acting for him and soon was seen in Dastak movie in 1996 in the role of a cop working along with Sushmita Sena dn Mukul Dev. He soon got the movie Dil Pe Mat Le Yaar in the lead role playing opposite Tabu after Aditya Srivastava left the project. This led a couple of other movies including Droh Kaal, Bandit Queen, and finally got the movie in his career Satya wherein he played the character of Bhiku Mhatre, which even give him a couple of awards including the National Award under supporting actor category.

His next movie Aks was a big hit giving him the top actor in negative character giving him a couple of awards. Similar was the story for the movie Shool wherein he played the character of a police officer. He was able to fetch the National Film Award, which was the Special Jury Award for the movie called Pinjar. Some of his other Bollywood movies include Veer Zaara, Zubeidaa, Road, Gangs of Wasseypur. His upcoming movies in Bollywood include Tevar along with Arjun Kapoor and Sonakshi Sinha, and Traffic. He started his career in South Indian movie with a Telugu film called Happy wherein he played the character of a police office. As far as his personal life is concerned, he is married to the actress Neha formerly known as Shabana Raza, the lady actor in Kareeb in opposite to Bobby Deol.
